description: This source file defines a composable Home Screen for an Android TV app using Jetpack Compose. It includes UI components such as a featured banner with background blur, multiple sections with horizontal carousels of media posters, focus management for TV navigation, and animated fade-in effects.

methods.name: HomeScreen
methods.description: Composable function that displays the main home screen with featured banner and categorized sections.

methods.name: FeaturedBanner
methods.description: Displays a large banner with a backdrop, title, overview, and a 'Play Now' CTA button, with background blur and overlay.

methods.name: SectionRow
methods.description: Displays a titled row with a horizontal lazy row of poster cards, with optional focus management and fade-in animation.
